website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice for people interested in all things weather-related. It measures barometric pressure plus temperature, humidity, future forecasts, and more.
pros: Easier to read than other types of barometers
Digital pressure sensors tend to be more accurate and are used in professional weather forecasting
cons: Some people prefer the challenge and appearance of analog barometers

customer_reviews.title: well constructed
customer_reviews.text: This device is simple to set up and use. It sets the correct date and time by itself. The numerals are enough big and easy to read and comprehend. The back light is blue and is really bright. Appears to be very accurate with the Weather Channel outside temps and humidity. Takes 4 batteries - 2 in the sensor and 2 in the receiver. Seems to be well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Tall

customer_reviews.title: It's hard to believe that you can get such a multi-purpose weather station at this price.
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a weather station for a while. At first I was a bit skeptical about remote sensors. I'm not sure if they will work at the distance I need, but I'm happy to report that they have an amazing range and work flawlessly. I like that you can add more sensors to get readings in different areas, ie outdoor and storage rooms. The display is very vivid in color, easy to read, and gives you a lot of information. All in all, I am very satisfied with this weather station. It's hard to believe that you can get such a multi-purpose weather station at this price.
customer_reviews.author: PhoebeLevi

customer_reviews.title: as descripted
customer_reviews.text: I took a long time to choose a thermometer and overlooked this several times as I didn’t really want a thermometer/hygrometer with alarm clock or other functions, I have my cellphone so I only want a thermometer/hygrometer. Anyway glad that I ended up going for this: it’s moderate size and very easy to set up(the manual is written in good English). Its shortcomings are basically within my expectation: screen isn't big, forecasts and alarm clock are unnecessary but fortunately they only occupy a small area. Everything else is really good, and it all works well.
customer_reviews.author: sum

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace another brand thermometer that when I wanted the outside temp. This one shows all the time and does not have to be in a direct line with each unit. Set up was easy and worked from the get go.
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: easy to set
customer_reviews.text: The service was prompt and this product does just what it says on the description. The instructions are very basic, product easy to set up and gives the information required for a product of this type.
customer_reviews.author: stanley kralik

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: Main unit looks pretty good at my bedside and works very well, but the sensor doesn't work! Have sent a email to seller a few hours ago but did not get any reply, have to return this product if I don't get a reply from the seller tomorrow. Update: 10/29/18 great customer support, it works.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Arrive ahead of time & easy to use. Just needs 2 * AAA batteries for the sensor outside and connect the sensor with main unit, set the time is easy. Seems to be very accurate so far and looks pretty good after tearing off the screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wenrich

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a month
customer_reviews.text: After setting it up it worked ok for a week or so and then I noticed that the date, times, and alarms were reverting back to what they were before set up sometimes. I started to inspect the power cord connection and then everything got completely wiped. So, thinking the plug connection to the clock was loose and just need to be pressed in a little more, that's what I attempted. The metal prong that the plug connected to broke off at that point. Leaving me with a giant paper weight. Needless to say, I returned it as defective and ordered a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Allen

customer_reviews.title: Not working properly
customer_reviews.text: I can not get the outdoor humidity to work OK. I have communicated with the manufacturer a number of times. Now they say that the sensor is not working correctly, but they are out of stock with a new sensor and they want ME to find someone to repair it for $5. Have you very heard of anything so out of line! I WAS INFORMED THAT I WOULD GET A NEW TRANSMITTER IN A MONTH, THE MONTH IS UP AND NO NEW TRANSMITTER. STILL NOT WORKING PROPERLY
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate at all! Stopped working after 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: 3 different temperatures and humidity readings when the base and outdoor sensor are all within 6 inches of each other. The outdoor sensor LED reads 74.5 degrees and 48% humidity, the base unit reads indoor temperature of 75.2 degrees and 53 % humidity, outdoor temperature of 77.9 degrees and 46 % humidity. The 3 difference reading for temperatures and humidity when the indoor and out door units are sitting within 6 inches of each other. Not accurate at all. After 20 minutes the outdoor readings stopped working. Unit being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: First sensor did not stay connected - not eligeble for customer support ?
customer_reviews.text: This is very unreliable . The outdoor sensor is randomly losing connection, regardles which channel I use. No customer support. You get what you pay for. Update: Seller Ciscox contacted me although I did buy the unit from a different seller. They sent me a replacement sensor right away and it is working perfectly. Upgraded from 1 star to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Klaus G.

customer_reviews.title: It works great as long as you undesrstand prinicple behind it.
customer_reviews.text: Its nice looking home use weather station. Setting up was really easy and it just took 1-2 minute to understand even without manual. The temperature readings are perfect and sometimes readings are 0.5 - 1 F off compare to my other aging Acurite weather station. Again its no surprise as its within its tolerance. The %RH readings are very accurate. There are certain things instructions tells and one of them is don't place your outdoor sensor in direct sunlight. Keep it in shade but outside else weather forecast wont work correctly. Indoor and outdoor sensors measure temperature, RH and pressure difference and based on these differences its predicts the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Sandip

customer_reviews.title: Greatly Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this weather station because I wanted something that would monitor temperatures at four locations. Since the item only comes with one sensor I tried to find a way to order additional sensors but cannot find them. I have checked the Facebook page and emailed the manufacturers but gotten no response. As a result I'm givng this item low ratings although I haven't unboxed it because I intend to return it if I cannot find additional sensors. I am very disappointed that Tohsssik does not provide better support for their product or support the claims they make in their advertisement implying the ability to monitor 4 locations with one base.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: defective weather station
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 as gifts. Returned the 1st one because it was defective and wouldn't sync up to outside sensor, so wouldn't read outside temp at all. Got a replacement but the second one did exactly the same thing. My second gift recipient said his outdoor temp would never change unless he unplugged it often. Am returning 2 original purchase stations and also returned the one replacement. I am going to try another brand. for $50 you should get some kind of quality station, I would think. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend for battery.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the cute little weather station, it lights up when it hears loud sounds (it says to clap in the instructions) or when a button is pressed. So it appears energy efficient and good for bedrooms. The outdoor sensor is not waterproof which I find very weird because it’s meant to be outdoors, and not many houses have a dry area to place it. I am fortunate to have one though and it works fine, the range isn’t the best but it’s decent for small houses.. The battery powered functionality sucks, not point in using it at all, the screen is way too dim. I recommend using this only if you can wire it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Adapter port broke on the 2nd day
customer_reviews.text: It's OK, if the power adapter port didn't break on the first day. Seems accurate, but the screen is not viewable from any angle other than straight line of sight. I like the alerts feature, but now that I can only use it with batteries, I figure I'll return it and try another brand
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kirsch

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable Price But Not Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Although the price is good, it is not accurate regarding humidity. I have six (6) other humidity monitors - two are indoor/outdoor monitors. The indoor AND outdoor humidity readings from this monitor was WAY off; sometimes more than ten percent (10%) off as compared to my other monitors. While it's expected that compared monitor readings will be slightly different, by one or two degrees or percentages, ten percent is not acceptable. I returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The product is a good start to someone who wants to get going on keeping track of the weather, temp, etc.. It has good features for the price. If the interest increases then a system with Mobile access to the info and more tracking and history features would come with a more feature rich unit. Good value
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM DIETRICH

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't function as well as it looks
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but forecast is inaccurate. Says it is raining on clear days & sunshine when it is raining. Don't know how accurate the barometer is but we have had several fronts in the past 2 weeks & the number doesn't change much so I have my doubts. Plan to return & find another product
customer_reviews.author: Terry Haney Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Overall, I'm very satisfied with this item
customer_reviews.text: Main unit easy to use and very nice looking, but the transmitter isn't waterproof, so I must set it in a place where it doesn't get wet or direct sunlight or the metering is incorrect. Ensure to setup like behind a balcony rail or behind a plant something to take cover off rain, dust, and sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph DelPico

customer_reviews.title: We love the weather station.
customer_reviews.text: Recently, I have seen many family weather stations looking for "one": balancing price and performance. This unit does a good job in many ways. The temperature reading is consistent, its connection to the signal transmitter is very stable, and it is a color screen with clock and weather prediction. It also has one of the brightest displays I have ever seen and can be easily seen from all corners of the room. Really worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferMark

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Went through a second set of batteries in less than a month. Did not get around to requesting refund in time. The screws stripped by the second time I tried to replace. Should have known better that to purchase this junk. More plastic in the landfill.... Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Worldart

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present it was for an older couple and they loved it. Not only is it partial but it is easy to program and easy to hang on to the wall. The other feature is large to read numbers that can be seen in day as well as the evening. I highly recommend this product for those who enjoy watching the weather . I updated by review as the product did not work after 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: RN1

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor sensor died after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: The outdoor sensor malfunctioned a few times (went dead) and had to be re-connected. After 4 months it died. I contacted the vendor via email and they replied due to Covid-19 they cannot get a replacement for some time. Never heard back. Interestingly enough the owners manual lists this as the number one problem. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coll display
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect little weather station. First of all the shipping was fast. Came one day sooner than expected. I like the look of this product. The displays are bright and easy to see. Looks good sitting on my shelf. I like that it has weather predictions on it as well.I had no trouble pairing device to the outdoor sensor. It's about 30 ft away and is connected just fine. Takes just minutes to set up.You can either plug this in or run it off to AA batteries. All around this is a great item.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Sankus

customer_reviews.title: Read what was communicated above
customer_reviews.text: If I knew the only customer service was through Facebook I would not have purchased. I own Facebook stock but do not use it. 1). I read 8pm as 8pm not 1800 2). Could not get day and date to be correct 3). Booklet directions are very poor, if they were written logically I would not have waisted time and would not have to returned 4) you are representing a product with no telephone #, no email address, no customer care except Facebook 5). I’m an American business person with a masters degree from an American university, may I suggest disclosing no customer connection except through Facebook
customer_reviews.author: barry

customer_reviews.title: Beeps on every sensor update cycle. Back in the box.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't stop mine from beeping every time the sensor updates (50 seconds or so), even with turning off all alarms and alerts I could find. Loud enough to be annoying. The rest is so-so...rather cheap plastic construction, it's always sunny, and the remote sensor is not supposed to be exposed to water. It's something I would expect to find for $5.99 at a discount store, right next to children's toys. Mine's back in the box, received no answer to my question concerning the beeping, so not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Working great after a year
customer_reviews.text: We've had this almost a year, and it's still working great. The screen has not dimmed as the reviews of some of the other thermometers have mentioned. At first we put standard batteries in the sender unit, and the outdoor temperature was not stable. But with lithium batteries the temperature is steady and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: The Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Weather Data With Attractive Display
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Great value. Super accurate and love the color display. The only issue is sometimes the blue color is hard to read from a distance ... or maybe my old eyes are just getting less keen... ? Humidity and indoor/outdoor temps seem spot on, and so useful to have that data before heading out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple setup accurate reading
customer_reviews.text: It functions well and we get all the information for indoor and outdoor temperatures. It even gives us the weather forecast though im not certain how it connects to the internet. Super simple setup only difficult thing was finding a place outside where it would not get wet in a very rainy city!
customer_reviews.author: Portlandsk8er

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and accurate
customer_reviews.text: This weather station comes with straight forward note guide to helps us to set up. Display are clear and easy to read. Also the thermometer and outdoor sensor also work well so far. Needed 4 of AA batteries to set them up. It's just simple and gives accurate information. Thank you for the fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Y4nishere

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Weather Station
customer_reviews.text: Clear screen, accurate (it seems) data. I needed an inexpensive way to monitor temperature and humidity in my garage and bought this. Straight forward, easy to use. I did have an issue with condition of item, shipment delivery damage, but vendor was quick to replace with no issues (through Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: Colorado_is_Home

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this item if you want to buy a weather station. A very high quality product with very accurate temperature and humidity. The middle part does take some time to determine the forecast, but this is predictable. Easy to read, excellent graphics and features. For this price, this is a good weather station. I am very satisfied with my purchase and I highly recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate, but kind of small
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a black and white screen weather station that was beginning to die. It is colorful, accurate and has a cute little boy who dresses for the weather. The unit is on top of my kitchen counter, and I have to pick it up to see it. I don't use it as an alarm clock. It is for accurate time, temperature and barometer readings. The buttons on the side are often accidentally hit, and the time is changed when I pick it up to read it.
customer_reviews.author: goldbutton

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Bright, easy to read even from across the room. Very easy to set up even though the directions were a little difficult...they do not show pictures of the different buttons in the back and was a little confusing until I got the big picture in my head.
customer_reviews.author: A. Breazzano

customer_reviews.title: No issues, worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this since Christmas of 2019-9/2020 of still works as described. Wife is a nut with always checking her phone for weather reports so she still loves it. Its dim so not bright at night. We have it across our room but if you clap loud enough it kicks on and I thought that was cool. If you are looking this is a good product
customer_reviews.author: Sapper

customer_reviews.title: Loved it...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Both indoor and outdoor device measures the temperature accurately. So far so good. The outdoor device doesn't need extra step to be connected. It connects automatically. The colorful display adds extra beauty to room. Liked and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: sukajee

customer_reviews.title: Weather station
customer_reviews.text: For us it turned out to be just to much stuff on the screen. Different colors, very busy. Just wanted something simple, so it could be perfect for someone that wants more information. Also we could not get the current day to be programmed and stay current.
customer_reviews.author: Tex vdb

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this weather station. No need to get up and go look at the temperature gauge outside to know how cold it is, or pick up my cell to see the time. The only problem I had was setting it to a 12hr clock, not military time, but figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really only bought this because of the temperature readings for outdoor and indoor and because it was fairly inexpensive. Luckily it seems to work pretty well. The forecast can be wrong at times but i think thats because it goes off barometer readings only. I have a mercury thermometer in my room and the weather station seems to be accurate. Overall great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kbachand

customer_reviews.title: Forecast not working
customer_reviews.text: Well..display is amazing ! Very easy to see from a crossed the room ....so far the temps seem pretty accurate however not a fan of the forecast....its need very overcast and gray today and now its evening hours and I've got the sunny symbol all day. If this is the forecast its incorrect as the weather channel is forecasting rain and overcast..will change my rating if I can get this to properly work .
customer_reviews.author: Renee Marbella

customer_reviews.title: Short life
customer_reviews.text: This weather station was just fine, but it stopped working 10 months after purchase. So, I don’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Walkermom

customer_reviews.title: Useful in the winter
customer_reviews.text: Winter makes it difficult for me to wear clothes when I go out. There is a heater in the house. I always think that one coat may be too much, but in the end it freezes like a dog. So I bought this weather station to inform the actual temperature difference between home, garage and outdoor. It is easy to install. You need to prepare 5 batteries. The manual is very simple. I couldn't connect the thermometer at first, but there are detailed step-by-step instructions in the manual. I completed all the operations in 10 minutes and can easily read the temperature. Amazing product. recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CoralDorothy

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking device.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking device. I always wanted to get on of these, it's handy to have around the house. Humidity meter is precise
customer_reviews.author: NatOdelette

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for staying on time!
customer_reviews.text: I needed some extra help getting out of the house on time and I'm glad I found this item! It's got a colorful display with everything I need to know to stay on time and head out for the day with some awareness of weather conditions. I haven't used the alarm yet, but it's another useful feature
customer_reviews.author: Lena Parson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: The unit more than 3 degrees off with the outdoor temperature and that’s what we bought the product for. We wrote to the seller about this but didn’t hear anything back. This is a terrible product and a substandard seller. We’re never written a negative review before but this product is the worst Amazon purchase we have ever made. Do yourself a favor and AVOID THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Temperature shows in large numbers at top of Monitor. Very easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: T. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The screen arrived cracked. It works great and seems accurate when compared to other local devices. Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: ffbreau

customer_reviews.title: 5 months later it no longer works.
customer_reviews.text: Only 5 months later the weather station no longer receives information from The outdoor sensor.
customer_reviews.author: RedDad

customer_reviews.title: EAAY TO READ
customer_reviews.text: This unit is easy to set up. It only took a few minutes to start displaying local weather information. Much more accurate than "local" weather news. I like the features and trend conditions of the barometer. You can adjust the brightness. You can pull it out and use it as a backup battery, which is very useful in the event of a power failure. This is the first time I have seen a remote sensor display temperature and humidity, so you can see outdoor information at the sensor. It also has an atomic clock setting for time.
customer_reviews.author: KingMichell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect weather station
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect weather station for my house. The thermometer has lots of great functions.I love the color coded indoor and outdoor temperature zones. Easy to setup product.It has a remote sensor that makes it very accurate. It has a lot of information in a small amount of space but it is really organized well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Product does what it says
customer_reviews.text: We got this upgraded Weather station after our previous outdoor sensor died. The bright colors of this weather forecast station and the easy visibility of the temperature numbers for both inside and out are awesome. Accurate forecasts and temperature plus all the other bells and whistles The only negative is the dimmer setting is not really "Dim". The dim setting needs to be reduced more because it can make it pretty bright at night, however, I turned it the opposite way from being so bright, then it is not visible from the bed. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly G.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The design of this weather station is excellent. The size of the colorful numbers makes it easy to read, even without my eyeglasses. The dimming feature means we can dim it down at night,if I’m no do that,it will automatically lower the brightness so it doesn't intrude on our sleep. The batteries on the outdoor sending unit (AA) are also easier to replace than with most weather stations we've owned before,temperature and humidity detection are also more accurate.I would mightily recommend this weather station to friends without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey April

customer_reviews.title: Great for temp
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to give me the temp inside my house and this is perfect. I also love being able to see the outside temp so that when I finally leave the house (this is written during COVID times) I have a better idea of how to dress. Not sure that I would ever use the temperature alert alarm, but cool feature none the less. Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sab

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I was initially skeptical about this product from other comments. But now I am happy with this product. It provides you with internal and external temperatures as well as internal and external humidity. It tells the time, date and weather. You can set an alarm when the indoor and outdoor temperatures are below or above a certain temperature. There are other features that I haven't explore yet, but so far it has done all the features I want.
customer_reviews.author: Ceylan Mavus

customer_reviews.title: Great clock/outdoor temp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves it! Let’s him know the outdoor temp to dress accordingly for work! I love that you can turn the lights down to dim or off to allow for darkness at night! Directions and set up were a breeze as well!
customer_reviews.author: Tisha V.

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate and easy to use/set up!
customer_reviews.text: This is really accurate, easy to use and power-friendly. It does not kill batteries. I am impressed with how easy everything connected automatically. A+! My main issue was accuracy and battery life and per the reviews, this seems to be the winner. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: DJB

customer_reviews.title: Helpful product
customer_reviews.text: We always want to know the indoor and outdoor temperature and humidity. We usually rely on forecasts, but they are usually not accurate. Since I started working at home, I have become sensitive to this information. If it is too hot, I need to turn on the air condition. When I focus on work, I have to adapt the enviriment to be effective. This product is really helpful, it contains a lot of information. As far as I know, most of them are quite accurate.
customer_reviews.author: RodneyJacob

customer_reviews.title: Great clock/weather station
customer_reviews.text: Seems accurate, beautiful screen, I would absolutely recommend this product to anyone that likes to keep an eye on the weather ,the alarm clock is definitely a nice function on it as well All in all I'm very surprised and would definitely buy again. Shipping was really fast and the product is of good quality
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Grunwell

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love all the information it provides and all the colors and visuals make it a great design element in my home office (dining room). I just keep it plugged in when it's on battery it seems too dim. Really like the humidity percentage, it helps to know when the dehumidifier needs to go back on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Station seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to set up, you can actually read the display from the entire room. Of course, you have to look directly at it, but I cannot read "The First Alarm" until I am about 5 feet away from it. The sensors are very accurate indoors and outdoors, and can receive outdoor sensors from a distance of 50 feet through metal garage doors, brick walls and a series of kitchen cabinets. I only played for a few days, but so far, I am very satisfied with this weather station.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Rodney

customer_reviews.title: A good digital product
customer_reviews.text: Interesting product. The display is clear. The product is easy to operate, can be hung up, the price is in line with the value of the product, worth buying. I enjoy seeing it every day and knowing what the weather is like outside. And little clouds of color.
customer_reviews.author: ella Maglio

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I Have purchased so far it is very accurate very reliable and very sturdy as in made of what looks like very durable parts and casing. I like how it doesn’t tilt cause that causes you to loose the clarity of the screen so far there is no glare from the sun hitting it through the window
customer_reviews.author: Daniel r

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and accurate
customer_reviews.text: It's really easy to set up. After inserting the battery, the remote sensor will automatically connect and tell me the external temperature. It requires 5 batteries and comes with a USB cable to connect to the base. The internal temperature matches my thermostat, and the external temperature matches the weather channel. It will automatically enter sleep mode, but if you press the snooze button, it will light up. Setting the date and time is also very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sayegh

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: It’s only two months old and definitely not keeping the correct outside. I don’t know why but the temperature is way off. Any ideas?
customer_reviews.author: C. Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: indoor outdoor thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Really like that it gives the percentage of humidity, to help us keep on top of dehumidifying and mold control. Not sure it's completely accurate, but seems close enough.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Complaint
customer_reviews.text: Number one, screen is so dark, very difficult to read, unless you hold it at an angle. Now, after using it for week, it gives no reading at all, despite new batteries in remote sensor. It was a gift so I am unable to return it. There is no company name, product information, model number etc. on the case. It is completely unusable Obviously I am unhappy with your product
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Nice product with pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: Product is good. I see below pros and cons. Pros: 1. Nice layout and easy to read fonts. 2. Outdoir Sensor connection to the device works fine to obtain outside temperature. Cons. 1. Display tiene off when using battery and not plugged in, may be for power saving. 2. Wall mount doesn't work nicely when hanged with power cord plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Kamal K.

customer_reviews.title: Onerous to use and doesn't really work
customer_reviews.text: This item has many flaws. 1) you can't see the face without turning the light on which is by a clap(come on), 2) it has no stand, stands up on it's own, 3) the barometer does not work and most of all, very onerous to set and use. I gave up and consider myself pretty literate on this stuff. I am returning it and would never recommend this product. Can't understand the good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Linn Duesterbeck

customer_reviews.title: Great Device
customer_reviews.text: I probably need to reread the instructions, but wish it would stay on all the time, and came with a power chord. Otherwise, great device.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Fiddler

customer_reviews.title: You'll  love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of our home and liked it so much I bought 2 more for our parents homes and they both loved the colorful displays
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L. VANSLYKE

customer_reviews.title: Affordable weather station
customer_reviews.text: This weather station conveniently plugs either usb or with betteries. This weather station with a beautiful color whihc will show you the temperature and 24-hour forecast all at once. The large screen is easy to read, the coming weather conditions will show by grapgic icons. You can hang it on a wall or sits on atable. Set up quickly, no wifi or network needed. It comes with a USB cable, also you can use it with batteries.
customer_reviews.author: CarolBeau

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking gadget to keep on dresser or nightstand
customer_reviews.text: This gadget looks great on the dresser. It doesn’t take up much space. It’s the first thing i look at when i get out of bed in the morning, Ive got to know the temperature. Easy to use and set up the features.
customer_reviews.author: diane porter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit. Easy to look at, and lots of info in one place.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasing to the eyes. Picks up signal from outdoor unit very well compared to others I’ve tried. It has a lot of info in one place.
customer_reviews.author: firewoodman

customer_reviews.title: Battery operated
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these. They were all able to be linked to one transmitter; and be located in different rooms in the house. Has a clear display that can be viewed from multiple angles. Very stable-can be mounted on a wall or displayed on a shelf/countertop without falling over.
customer_reviews.author: Esther E. White

customer_reviews.title: Cool little gadget
customer_reviews.text: What a neat little gadget! Super cute and easy to use. It was tricky for me to program but after reading the instructions, I figured it out. Very cute and It would be super cool on a boat too!
customer_reviews.author: robin Felix

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: My unit is not calibrated correctly. The outside sensor seems to be fine but the inside doesn't register the currect humidity. Also, my unit doesn't work with batteries anymore. When it came time to replace the batteries, it would just constantly beep at me with the screen not turning on. I have to use the wallplug.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Outside readings not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Outside readings are not accurate. Its raining yet it shows sunny on the monitor. So forecast is irrelevant since it doesn't work correctly. Temperature is drastically affected by placement. Outdoor sensor needs to be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice weather station. Very colorful and easy to read. Accuracy of temp and forecast are not the best but I do like the unit. I had a hard time setting the clock so it was not in the 24 hour mode. Batteries removed several times until it was set to my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Very good so far
customer_reviews.text: Product looks to be very good so far, as I have only had it a few days. I know the after service is very good from experience because I had a problem when I installed it. They replied to me the same day and told me how to rectify the problem.
customer_reviews.author: VenusElva

customer_reviews.title: Why get just a clock?
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a clock by her bathroom sink. Rather than buy just a clock, I bought her this weather station so she would see the time and weather as she decided what to wear for the day. She is delighted with it and really enjoys the different colors which makes it easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: TXrunner

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: This weather station is the perfect size for me to be able to read easily across the room. It provides a lot of information in an organized way. It also provides accurate information, which is great for me to monitor the weather and temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work great!
customer_reviews.text: I just set this up an hour ago and it seems to work very well. The set up was easy and I love the display since it is nice and easy to read. We bought this for the camper so it'll be handy that it is rechargeable. Happy with the purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Roxene Cook

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: This product is good because it can be plugged into a wall outlet. In this way, the display screen will be very bright and readable. If you only use battery power, you must press a button to see the display. Since I have a convenient power outlet, I prefer this kind of monitor, but if you have no power outlet. Everything is there, and the unit is working fine and setting up is not difficult.
customer_reviews.author: MiloHorace

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this weather station. Love the bright colors and I'm very happy that it is quite accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Robert  G Cribari

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Big Screen
customer_reviews.text: I just received this for Christmas very nice screen easy to set up and read highly recommend excellent buy,
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: A pretty weather station
customer_reviews.text: It looks elegant & it's accurate with the sensor in my backyard. Also I can always wakeit up by a clapping
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Looked for a simple & beautifully designed weather station and I came across this one, It has alarm function which is important for me. The installation was a breeze. During battery operation, the display does not light continuously, but the AC power mode allows continuous lighting. The wall mounting can be done by a rear-mounted recess, screws are not included, as well as no AA batteries. It is my second weather station in the house and its far better than the last one I recommend the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: benson

customer_reviews.title: A fine little weather station
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to see from a variety of angles. It seems to be accurate in its readings in my experience so far. It was well packaged as well. My one issue is that the outdoor sensor piece advised not to get it wet, I mean ots an outdoor weather sensor
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy M.

customer_reviews.title: Weather station a must if you have kids
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up...great for the upcoming school year to know the outside temp for my kids....great display...buying another for my neighbors
customer_reviews.author: William Su

customer_reviews.title: Great value and performance
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comprehensive data collecting device with brilliant colors and easy to understand scree
customer_reviews.author: dbtekno

customer_reviews.title: The humidity is stuck on 20% (update)
customer_reviews.text: First it was working fine but after few month the humidity is not showing right. It always shows 20% even if I run humidifier all night. Update : the seller sent me a new one, without me asking. Works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nataliia C

customer_reviews.title: worked very well
customer_reviews.text: I had got it for myself so I would know temperature inside and outside of house and the humid.but I gave it to my sister. So must likely I will get another one. Thank you. It is great to have.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Justason

customer_reviews.title: I only have this for about a month, but so far all previous purchases are better.
customer_reviews.text: The display is slightly larger, but the numbers are much larger, making it easier for the weather station to read from the room. From almost all perspectives, this display can also be compared to previous sites. Previous display performance was poor and only allowed to be viewed from certain angles. I only have this for about a month, but so far all previous purchases are better.
customer_reviews.author: NewmanLester

customer_reviews.title: Great but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: A nice weather station that is easy to operate and has clear instructions, very useful! I have measured the temperatures with another device to confirm whether the sensors measure correctly. The test was successful, the forecast is not very accurate but others are correct. Very good weather station for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Booth

customer_reviews.title: weather station
customer_reviews.text: Was impressed on this one. Easy to read. and directions were good also. Still working after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Susan mh

customer_reviews.title: Good weather station
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had already come with the cord to plug it into the wall. I had a hard time finding an adapter that would work.
customer_reviews.author: jewelry mom

customer_reviews.title: Colorful screen
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool weather station that contains many detailed information about weather forecasts and various measurements, and is related to weather. It is very convenient to put in the kitchen so that we can always know what the weather is outside. It is simple to set up and has a beautiful color display.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Neat
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this weather station primairily to use in my RV. It's well made, neat and was simple to set up from the instructions. It is the thermometer I'm most interested in as the thermometer on the RV air conditioner appears to be wildly inaccurate. So far it works very well and I'm more than happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, seems mostly accurate
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work great! It was easy to set up. I love the indoor outdoor feature so I know warm to dress to take the dogs out. It does say it's partly cloudy, and there's not a cloud in the sky, but it goes by barometer and you can't adjust that. Other than that it seems accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Husky mom

product_meta.title: Weather Station, Rechargeable Weather Stations Wireless Indoor Outdoor Thermometer Hygrometer, with Color Screen, Weather Forecast, Alarm Clock, Temperature Alarm, Adjustable Bright(with 1 Sensor)
feature_bullets: ✔ UP TO MONITOR 4 AREAS INDOOR & OUTDOOR TEMPERATURE, Humidity - Internal/external temperature/humidity display in °C or °F optional and records Min/max Temperatures and humidity percentages with trend arrows to indicate where the humidity or temperature is headed to alert you of changes to your environment. 3 remote sensor channels are allowed, and the weather station to display 4 different room data. (Package only include 1 outdoor sensor)

✔ COLORFUL SCREEN WITH WEATHER FORECAST AND BAROMETER GRAPH - With a large color screen, The backlight can be activated by pressing the light button. The color night light makes it possible to clearly see the contents of the screen from every angle, even in the dark. And it features weather forecast that's able to predict the weather conditions with barometric pressure, 12-24 hours in advance and then display the weather forecast via 5 icons (sunny, partially cloudy, rainy and snow).

✔ TIME & DATE & ADJUSTABLE BRIGHTNESS - Alarm clock and repeat function. Clock in 12/24 adjustable. Tohsssik Weather Station 8 seconds to automatically enter the energy-saving mode to reduce the brightness, tap to wake up to normal brightness, will not bother you at night. It also has three levels of brightness, you can push the button(LIGHT/SNZ) on the back to adjust the brightness to meet your preference and demands.

✔ TEMPERATURE ALARM & SNOOZE FUNCTION TIME ALARM - Tohsssik weather station has an alarm clock function with SNOOZE function. When you place it in your bedroom, not only a wireless weather station it is, but also is an alarm clock and temperature alarm. When the alarm rings, press any button on the back to activate the snooze function, you will get more 5 minutes of snooze time. And you can set a max and min temperature, when the actual temperature exceeds them, the alarm will sound.

✔ 100% SATISFACTION SERVICE - No worries about the after-sale service. You will get the 48-month after sales service and lifelong consulting service. If you face any problem with our product, please feel free to contact us. Package includes: TOHSSSIK WEATHER STATION*1(use 2A batteries), OUTDOOR SENSER*1(use 3A batteries), POWER CABLE*1, USER MANUAL*1. (Package does not include batteries)
